medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started yesterday, continuous, sharp, associated with nausea, anorexia, and subjective fevers. First episode of this pain. When it did not improve, he came to the emergency department for evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HIV positive, Tuberculin positive treated in the 1980s, History of Pneumocystis pneumonia, Kaposi's Sarcoma regressed with HAART, Lipodystrophy, Hypertension, History of resistant gonorrhea treated with streptomycin, History of chlamydial infection, Perirectal HSV, Shoulder pain/impingement, Right wrist tenosynovitis, Depression, Erectile dysfunction, History of nephrolithiasis, Questionable history of Crixivan use, Right plantar fasciitis.
